description:
In this DLC for Cooking Arena:
You will be able to explore Asian Food and become the best gourmet cooking master at your brand-new food truck!

Take orders, make delicious dishes and be fast to serve the hordes of hungry customers who will queue in front of your counter!

Be careful not to burn the food!

Fulfil your dream of becoming the best food truck tycoon in the city!

IN "FOOD TRUCK TYCOON - ASIAN CUISINE" YOU WILL FIND:

• 150 levels to explore, 150+ dishes to serve.
• Great cartoonish graphics, music and sound effects.
• Countless upgrades you can apply to ingredients and bar decorations.
• 30+ Achievements to complete.
• Easy to play and hard to master.

Go ahead, try it out!
name: Cooking Arena: Food Truck Tycoon Asian Cuisine (DLC#2)
